Site.Name: Frez Flight
Site.Address: 132 Upper Iweka Road, Onitsha, Anambra State, Nigeria
Site.AboutUs: Frez Flight is a Forecasting system that will help avaition industries to to do a weather forecast effectively. It a weather forecasting system for Aviation industry that would provide information concerning the weather conditions on a daily basis, and information would be useful for Aircraft landing information, Aircraft take-off, Making decisions on route changes and inconveniences, Discomfort arising from altitudinal changes in flight.
Site.AboutUs2: Frez Flight proposed new system is design to enhance the following: Convenience, Consistency of Data, Reliability, Increases Productivity, Easy update and Maintenance Operations, Variety, Speed Optimization and reduce paper work.
